resources.string: Offline maps are required to proceed. We have partnered with MAPS.ME to provide you with offline maps of KAUST, Jeddah and beyond!\nTo continue, please download the app. After downloading the required data, you will be able to use it without an internet connection.

Hello, Welcome and thank you for downloading the Orientation 2015 app! This is an information app made for students, by students.

We would like to thank the following people:

√ Liam Mencel and Uchenna Akujuobi for app development.
 √ Yiannis Hadjimichael for graphic design.
 √ Juho Happola for support with the Travel Maps.
 √ Andrew Yip for developing the Bus planner web app.
 √ And finally Todd Pietruszka and Paul Bennett for support from Graduate Services.
If you have any questions, problems or feedback regarding the app, please contact:\nliam.mencel@kaust.edu.sa
